channel.title: Im back and quite confused
channel.description:
School is starting in a few weeks, and I am going to take JAVA, Even though I already know it for the most part, I want to to be a snap. So I am back to private servers.
So my question is, what exactly happened while I was gone?, I see alot of changes have happened
And what source should I download to start working on? I deleted all my old sources\, and I see the ones I did use arent used anymore, so What should I work on?
PS: I am going to try and program Clan Chat, I have it all planned out in pseudocode, Just need to write it in JAVA, (It will consists of commands such as ::joinchat ROOMNAME, ::regchat ROOMNAME, ::chat MESSAGE, ::rank USER, ACCESS, and then some admin settings. When some 1 registers a chat room, will create a file in a chat/ folder. with all the settings, users/ranks, etc.
I am just confusing on how to display messages, but I can view how the ::say works and create a new one and hopefully find a way to change color of it.

item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

a class called JAVA? thats heaven =]
hmm it depends what sources you like, im building from C-Workz, cuz the skills and dueling system are lovely
if its not on forums here,google it, but you take a risk of a virus
